author: senh
title: TSA Cracks Down on Airport Workers After Gun Bust
text: BING NEWS: TSA Cracks Down on Airport Workers After Massive Christmas Gun Bust Airport and airline employees are now going through security just like everybody else, the Transportation Security Administration said Tuesday. That and almost two dozen other security weaknesses are being fixed under new rules put in place after last ... 07/14/2015 - 5:03 pm | View Link White House rooms, TSA hearing evacuated Tuesday According to a CNN report, cracks in the system included TSA failing to identify 73 active workers who had links to terrorism ... Director for the Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport Rebecca Roering.
